title: How do i use chroma in new draft?
body: as much as i like the new draft system i can seem to find the option to select Chroma. anyone know how to do it or was it just forgotten about during implementation?

replies.body:
Hey Setsi,

There's no option to select Chromas right now (either a bug or an oversight), but it will be fixed in an upcoming patch. In the meantime, try playing a custom match and selecting the Chroma that you'd like so it is set to default for when you play your new Champ Select match. This was a known workaround for the same problem in Team Builder, so let me know if it works.

-DTN
Doesn't seem to work, thanks anyway
